org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms

Interface DoFn.ExtraContextFactory<InputT,OutputT>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoFn.FakeExtraContextFactory
    Enclosing class:
    DoFn<InputT,OutputT>

    public static interface DoFn.ExtraContextFactory<InputT,OutputT>
    Interface for runner implementors to provide implementations of extra context information.

    The methods on this interface are called by DoFnInvoker before invoking an annotated DoFn.StartBundle, DoFn.ProcessElement or DoFn.FinishBundle method that has indicated it needs the given extra context.

    In the case of DoFn.ProcessElement it is called once per invocation of DoFn.ProcessElement.

    • Method Summary

      Construct the BoundedWindow to use within a DoFn that needs it.
      WindowingInternals<InputT,OutputT> windowingInternals()
      Deprecated. 
      Please port occurences of OldDoFn to DoFn. If they require state and timers, they will need to wait for the arrival of those features. Do not introduce new uses of this method.

    • Method Detail

      • window

        BoundedWindow window()
        Construct the BoundedWindow to use within a DoFn that needs it. This is called if the DoFn.ProcessElement method has a parameter of type BoundedWindow.
        Returns:
        BoundedWindow of the element currently being processed.

      • inputProvider

        DoFn.InputProvider<InputT> inputProvider()
        A placeholder for testing purposes.

      • outputReceiver

        DoFn.OutputReceiver<OutputT> outputReceiver()
        A placeholder for testing purposes.

      • windowingInternals

        @Deprecated
WindowingInternals<InputT,OutputT> windowingInternals()
        Deprecated. Please port occurences of OldDoFn to DoFn. If they require state and timers, they will need to wait for the arrival of those features. Do not introduce new uses of this method.
        For migration from OldDoFn to DoFn, provide a WindowingInternals so an OldDoFn can be run via DoFnInvoker.

        This is not exposed via the reflective capabilities of DoFn.

      • restrictionTracker

        <RestrictionT> RestrictionTracker<RestrictionT> restrictionTracker()
        If this is a splittable DoFn, returns the RestrictionTracker associated with the current DoFn.ProcessElement call.
